Question: HirelyAi CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
HirelyAI

Product: Unbiased AI Interview and hiring tools

- Revolutionizing job interview prep with AI
- Empowering businesses with efficient and fair hiring practices
- Accepted into the Deepgram Startup Program to enhance AI capabilities
- Addressing hiring biases through AI
- Utilizing AI to take bias out of hiring
Summary_cn:
HirelyAI

产品：公正的人工智能面试和招聘工具

- 通过人工智能革新职位面试准备
- 为企业提供高效公正的招聘实践手段
- 被Deepgram创业计划接纳，以提升人工智能能力
- 通过人工智能解决招聘偏见问题
- 运用人工智能消除招聘中的偏见
